content.description:
Start matched on a hold just outside where the top boulder stops covering the bottom boulder. Use a toe jam in the crack or low feet to move left hand out and do balance moves to top out. All holds seem stable, which is very rare for the area, and not too sharp

 Very much so opportunity to start half way in cave ledge (probably around v6) or farther for harder.
content.location: On a set of boulders broken off the main face, appears as if people have camped in the cave created

content.description: Two boulders, one on top of the other which creates a strange crack ledge from the right and topping out to the left. Looks like people have camped in this cave before
